sentences.sContent: HIGHCLEAN is a nonflammable water-soluble cutting fluid of high performance and storage durability.
sentences.sContent_eng: HIGHCLEAN is a nonflammable water-soluble cutting fluid of high performance and storage durability.
sentences.sCn: HIGHCLEAN是高性能和存贮耐久性不易燃的溶于水乳化切削油。

sentences.sContent: Biological cleanser is made of natural plant extraction liquid, with alcohol-free, nonflammable, sterilizing and antistatic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Biological cleanser is made of natural plant extraction liquid, with alcohol-free, nonflammable, sterilizing and antistatic.
sentences.sCn: 生物清洁剂为天然植物萃取液，不含酒精，不可燃，除细菌，并可抗静电；

sentences.sContent: Gaseous argon is tasteless, colorless, odorless, non corrosive, and nonflammable. Argon belongs to the family of rare inert gases.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gaseous argon is tasteless, colorless, odorless, non corrosive, and nonflammable. Argon belongs to the family of rare inert gases.
sentences.sCn: 气态氩无味，无色，无嗅，无腐蚀性，不可燃。氩属于稀有惰性气体家族。

remMethod.val: non(不) + flammable(易燃的) → 不易燃的； 注意不要和inflammable(adj. 易燃的)相混

trans.tranOther: nonflammable materials or substances do not burn easily or do not burn at all
